mapper.insert: insert into jisikin_answer (answer_no, answer_secret_yn, jisikin_no, user_id, answer_contents) values (jisikin_answer_seq.nextval, #{secretYn}, #{jisikinNo}, #{userId}, #{contents})
mapper.select: select answer_no no, answer_create_date createDate, answer_selected_yn secretYn, answer_secret_yn secretYn, jisikin_no jisikinNo, answer_recommend recommend, user_id userId, answer_contents contents from jisikin_answer where jisikin_no = #{value} order by answer_create_date desc
